entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • discrepancy between TcpClient constructor and Connect method #67879
  • Timeouts in `System.Text.Json.Tests` on arm32 #67878
  • Custom apphost fails to flush nettrace file on shutdown #67877
  • StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase does not consistently match ToUpperInvariant #67873
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Expose method to get system message for system error code #67872
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'fgDomsComputed' during 'Determine first cold block' (Tier0-FullOpts) #67871
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(constIndexOffset % elemSize) == 0' #67870
    7.0.0
  • ARM64 - GT_MADD - do not emit 'msub' in code-gen #67869
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Poolable / Resettable CBOR Readers #67868
  • Rolling build failure: LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.Diagnostics.StringMarshallingForwardingNotSupported_ReportsDiagnostic #67864
  • crossgen2 fails on assemblies that include embedded types #67855
  • System.Text.Tests.Perf_StringBuilder.Append_Char_Capacity has regressed on x86 #67854
    7.0.0
  • [tests][tvOS] Some System.IO tests are failing #67853
  • S.P.C PDB is being overwritten by NativeAOT PDB in folder #67851
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Enable JsonEncodedText to be initialized with already encoded bytes. #67850
  • crossgen2 fails when a Managed C++ dll is passed as a reference assembly #67849
  • System.Diagnostics.Perf_Process.GetProcessById has regressed 50% on Windows #67847
  • [source build] use of undeclared identifier 'kSecUseDataProtectionKeychain' #67846
  • The thread pool's global queue doesn't scale well on machines with a large processor count #67845
    7.0.0
  • Help: .Net 6 and emitting IL to call constructors and methods that have pointers as arguments #67844
  • Aot Compiler need to handle increased RequiresDynamicCode scope #67843
  • EqualityComparer<TEnum?>.Default allocates #67842
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: APIs for working with unix file mode #67837
  • Struct values with no set fallback to default. #67835
  • ecdh sharekey #67832
    Future
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.SerializationWithPerTypeAttributeContextTests.RoundTripIndexViewModel #67830
  • Test failure System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests.ConcurrentQueueTests.ManyConcurrentAddsTakes_CollectionRemainsConsistent #67828

Closed

  • Determine if/how to handle default timeouts in RegexGenerator #59491
    7.0.0
  • dotnet test host process crashed on Ubuntu 20.04 #60685
  • CoreCLR's dbgshim is moving into dotnet/diagnostics repo #65017
    7.0.0
  • [Localization] Confirm English sentence #67556
    7.0.0
  • [Localization] Improvement for English resouce #67555
    7.0.0
  • GZipCompressor implemented in netstandard2.0 package not working in .NETFramework4.8 #65665
  • Blazor Webassembly - Debugger crashes app #66149
  • Assemblies compiled in 6.0 and main contain an incorrect TargetPlatformAttribute in their metadata #64616
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] windows specific performance regression #66615
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow IReadOnlyDictionary GetValueOrDefault parameter key to be nulllable #67738
  • Generation of references will generate several changes #67784
  • [Mono] Official build fails with libdbgshim.so missing from manifest #67829
  • Test failure profiler\\gc\\gc\\gc.cmd #67826
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark GCStressIncompatible and similar tests as out-of-proc #67876
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix inadvertent logical AND #67875
    area-System.Speech
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1711663 #67874
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix incorrect results of right shifting huge BigIntegers error reported in Issue #65633 #67867
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update Roslyn test sdk. #67865
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Enable installation on Ubuntu 22.04 - add libssl3 dependency #67862
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 5.0.x
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Run large file test on its own #67857
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm] Initial SIMD support #67848
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Annotating Regex library for Native Aot apps #67841
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix off-by-1000 error reported in issue#67807 #67834
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • HttpHeaders should not remove invalid values during validating access #67833
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix exception and enable event logging when service has no name #67827
    area-System.ServiceProcess

Merged

  • Explicitly referencing the latest Netstandard library #67866
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Consider `Type.IsByRefLike` an intrinsic when possible #67852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use logical and for boolean operation in bstr #67858
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support default timeouts in RegexGenerator #67775
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Added test for extracting zip files with invalid characters in Windows #67332
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [mono] Avoid trying to fork to a debugger on tvos. #67856
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update xlf files #67863
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update message based on offline feedback. #67860
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add libssl3 dependency to Debian DEPS package #67705
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.x
  • Removing of unused parameter #67836
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Added the `hard_limit_exceeded_p` back as without it, we won't be retrying another heap to fit the new allocation. #67724
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add more diagnostics info for LookupProperty assert failure #67838
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Small MsQuicStream reafactorings #67839
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Reenable SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.ClientSettingsReceived_Success test #67418
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add CoverageIncludeTests mention to coverage.md #67779
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix dbgshim entry in platform manifest #67831
    blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure-installer

Updated

  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Support ByRefLike types as Generic parameters #67783
    NO-MERGE, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • S.S.C.Cose: Add Async Stream-based signatures #67786
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to TimeStamp, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, and TimeOnly #67666
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Code fix to add DisableRuntimeMarshalling when required #67676
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add iOS Startup Scenario (Runtime side) #67670
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Adding Regex.EnumerateMatches #67794
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Add/use CustomTypeMarshaller implementations for string marshalling #67635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • ARM64 - Emitting `msub` instruction #66621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix bug where a gc struct is not zero initialized #67825
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Mono] Fix uninitialized vtable bug #67746
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix nullability warnings for NativeAOT CoreLib #65137
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] [Mono] Fix uninitialized vtable bug #67759
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix hanging of NamedPipeClientStream when connecting with infinite timeout #66877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix incorrect format string arguments #67464
    area-Host, codeql
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • add code to read active listeners on FreeBSD #64433
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Add C instrumentation to native libs (Native PGO) #67820
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix a thread pool test #67399
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Faster IndexOf for arm64 #67811
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fixed error messages on collections indexing #67696
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix for number of used frame infos during crossgen2 compilation #64549
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [arm64] Add RCPC ISA (8.3+) and use ldap for volatile reads #67384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • DebuggerDisplay Stopwatch #65753
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Adding missing SDK assets for Publish #67765
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix exception thrown when MsQuicStream write direction is locally aborted #67753
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • crossgen2: Add --imagebase option #65567
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use SystemNative_GetTimestamp to calculate BootTime #67589
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publishing a Maui Windows app SelfContained=false doesn't run #24801
  • SDK should add NETStandard.Library v2.x reference instead of the NETStandard.Library v1.6.1 #24799
  • Unify the LaunchSettings profle handling between `watch` and `run` #24798
    Backlog
  • Please stop setting Restore configuration properties in targets #24797

Closed

  • Update URL for dotnet-core-preview #17128
    6.0.4xx
  • Testhost runtimeconfig is rewritten #24769

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24800
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #24787
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/6.0.3xx] Add source-build metadata to razor-compiler #24796
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add SourceBuild metadata to razor-compiler dependencies #24794
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.2xx] Add source-build metadata to razor-compiler #24795
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a netsdk code to the preview message so we can support things like nowarn and documentation #24662
    Area-NetSDK
  • Don't retarget testhost #24770
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Fix broken blog post link #24707
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1711766 #24673
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Turn test back on. #24661
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24446
  • Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24760

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VSTypeScriptHandlerTests flaky #60694
  • Test composition fails when a part is rejected #60690
  • Recommender.GetRecommendedSymbolsAtPosition incorrectly assumes the input SemanticModel is in Workspace.CurrentSolution #60685
  • Odd behavior when passing nullable value types as parameter #60683
  • Spurious CS8619 - A nullable ushort should behave identically (apart from the size of the variable) to a nullable int. #60681
    Compiler.Next
  • The type of the group join and join variable after `into` and `join` keywords isn't displayed on tooltip #60680

Closed

  • Add support for document specific analyzer options #3798
    Backlog
  • Remove using leaves leading lines #34201
    Backlog
  • 'Remove unnessasary usings' should remove redundant line break when import groups are separated #45866
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Share the indices we create for files that do not have PP directives in them #60693
    Area-IDE
  • Fix "top-level statements" feature name to match published name #60692
    Area-IDE
  • Stop switching /langver to preview for generator tests #60691
    Area-IDE
  • IDE changes for "Unsigned Right Shift" feature, plus tests. #60689
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Fill out test plan for auto-default structs #60688
    Area-Compilers
  • Add TS external access API for ICommentSelectionService #60687
    Area-IDE
  • Expose new Recommender API #60686
    Area-IDE
  • Allow generating variable with contextual keyword name in return statements #60684
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60682
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Remove IDynamicFileInfo-added syntax trees to attempt to improve perf #60531
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60674
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Support declaration and consumption of user-defined Unsigned Right Shift operator. #60616
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60490
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Formatting and code generation options #60127
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Trim unnessasary leading lines when removing usings #60672
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Remove duplicate package references #60658
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60679
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • handle null compilations in entry point finder #60562
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid formatting diagnostics with raw strings #60655
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix the KeybindingResetDetector #60494
    Area-IDE
  • Add parameters in scope in nameof in certain attributes #60642
    Area-Compilers
  • Extract base class extracting generic type parameter now (#55871) #60671
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update csc.dll path in launch.json #60663
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Allow shared projects to specify a real project to proxy too for building and testing in VS Code #60664
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix crash when combining reordered arguments with params array #60590
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.2
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • Check val escape for initializers of fields with ref-like type #60577
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings #59809
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Support SetsRequiredMembersAttribute #60392
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR: AllowAnonymous and Authorize don't play well together under Windows authentication #41139
  • Allow knowing before render if `RenderFragment<T>` will return null or empty #41138
  • Add the code in Counter.razor, press Ctrl + F5 then delete this code, error "ENC0033 Deleting auto-property 'IncrementAmount' requires restarting the application" pop up #41133
  • Quarantine ClientCertificate_NoOrDelayed_Available_Ignored #41131
    Test failures
  • Multiple Authentication Schemes Validation chain behavior #41130

Closed

  • Change EndpointMetadataContext/EndpointParameterMetadataContext classes to use constructors to set property values #41117
    7.0-preview4
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 6, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-114719-.NET6 #37620
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, aspnetcore, .NET 7, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 7 #aspnetcore-113594-.NET7 #37473
  • SignalR client should send keepalive ping immediately when connected #41081
  • Add header `Request-Context` to class Microsoft.Net.Http.Headers.HeaderNames #41084
  • SetCookieHeaderValue - System.TypeLoadException: Could not load type Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.InplaceStringBuilder' #40255
  • Results<T1, TN> union types should implement IEndpointMetadataProvider #41097
    7.0-preview4
  • Build template packages in servicing #40637
  • Template 'ASP.NET Core Web App' adds unnecessary usings to Startup.cs #41114
  • HTTP/3: Remove try/catch around IsSupported property #41042
    7.0-preview4
  • Blazor app.razor NotFound not authorizing #41113
  • [Question] `HttpContext.TraceIdentifier` vs `Activity.Current.Id` #39873
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Add redis startup error handling #41141
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview4
  • USe Project References #41137
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SDK #41136
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add ctors to EndpointMetadataContext/EndpointParameterMetadataContext #41116
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `af29db7` to `a1cc8c5` #41135
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • Remove try/catch around IsSupported property #41123
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview4
  • Make Results<TResult1, TResultN> union types implement IEndpointMetadataProvider #41109
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Quarantine recently failing tests #41132
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime
  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    area-web-frameworks
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Adding support for custom JsonConverter(s) when deserializing JSON patches to generic object types #40966
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Normalize data protection app discriminator #41095
    area-dataprotection
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable trimming for data protection #41118
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40707
    area-infrastructure
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'dotnet-dump analyze' crashes when loading core dump #3003
  • Soshelp does not show available switches #2999

  • Suggestion: convert sosplugin commands to sub-commands of `sos` command #2998

PullRequests

Updated

  • Test symstore retry changes #2968

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Soft Keyboard does not Pop Up when Entry View's Focus is set to True Programmatically #5983
  • Add license headers to source files. #5978
  • Debugger wrongly assigns SDK Version to device #5977
  • ControlTemplate not rendered if applied to a ContentPage #5976
  • Unable to run Windows application from command line #5975
  • Setting BackgroundColor from code doesn't do anything for Shapes #5974
  • Setting View.BackgroundColor = null doesn't reset the color on Android #5973
  • Mixing Shell and Push/Pop Navigation Sometime Fails #5965

Closed

  • [Bug] Error loading images on Windows #3160
    6.0.300
  • The XyzMapper fields on each Handler type should be 'readonly' #4870
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Updating layout options at runtime does not trigger a layout #5734
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Publishing an unpackaged Windows app fails by default #5881
    6.0.300
  • How to set a content page in MAUI full screen #5968
  • Changing Button.BackgroundColor does not take effect immediately on Windows #5972
  • Add Folder Dialog #5969
  • Minimize button and maximize button of Window work only after double click #5966
  • Page disappear from time to time and shown only after maximize the window #5967
  • No option to add resource dictionary file #5970
  • [Bug] VerticalAligment not working on SearchBar, Editor and Label for #3119
    6.0.300
  • NavigationPage.BarTextColor Error #5955

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove downcasts in BlazorWebView #5984
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • BlazorWebView API review changes: Shared sources #5982
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Use SizeToFit when measuring Editor on iOS with infinite constraints #5981
    area/layout 🔲
  • Move Handler?.UpdateValue after PropertyChanged events #5980
    area/controls 🎮
  • Maui Windows unpackaged app fails to start #5979
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/publishing 🏁
  • [Android] Fix issues rendering gradients and CornerRadius on Button #5971
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • Match in-tree order of targets with workloads and fix some WinUI issues #5923
    t/bug, p/0, area/infrastructure 🏗️, fatal, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Update iOS / Mac Catalyst Blazor Hybrid APIs #5919
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Allow non-dot decimal separator in BindingExpression #5005
    area/Xaml </>, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/localization, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix backbutton visibility when popping #5893
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix Label.VerticalTextAlignment on Windows #5623
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300-rc.2

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Fix some of the violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • Keep the text wrapping/truncation and max lines stuff in Controls #5936
    area/controls 🎮
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, .NET 7
  • [Blazor] Use static AppOriginUri everywhere #5941
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [android] Update to latest AndroidX packages with better Trimmable support. #5889
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Clean-up and fix VisualTreeElementExtensions hit testing #5892
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix cleanup and wiring up when changing out the content on window #5917
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Update Editor scroll position #4850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] Implement FlyoutHeaderBehavior property #5345
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [templates] add a new maui-blank template #5433
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query a subclass that shares the same table than its parents may result in a downcasting issue #27802
  • GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using null/default values #27801

Closed

  • Can't zip database file in 6.0.0+ update as connection logic is being held after query completed #27797
  • Unnecessary memory allocations in SnapshotRows #27798

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-11
entry.content:
PullRequests
